sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: MoneyHero Limited (MNY) Stock: Drops 21% as AI Transformation and Revenue Mix Propel Growth
feed.summary: MoneyHero Limited (MNY) saw its stock price drop by 21.25% despite a 17% sequential revenue increase in Q3 2025, driven by strategic shifts to higher-margin products and AI-driven operational efficiencies. The company aims for positive adjusted EBITDA in Q4 2025, leveraging cost controls and a strong cash position to fuel continued growth in insurance, wealth, and personal loan segments. However, investor concerns about long-term profitability persist despite the positive financial performance.

feed.title: MoneyHero Group (NASDAQ: MNY) teams with HashKey to broaden SFC-licensed digital asset access in Hong Kong
feed.summary: MoneyHero Group (NASDAQ: MNY) has announced a collaboration with HashKey Group to expand its digital asset wealth product offerings in Hong Kong. This partnership integrates an SFC-licensed digital asset platform into MoneyHero's network, providing consumers with greater access to regulated digital asset products. The initiative aligns with Hong Kong's progressive stance on digital asset regulation and MoneyHero's strategy to enhance its personal finance ecosystem in the Asia Pacific region.

feed.title: MoneyHero Limited Expands Digital Asset Wealth Offerings Through Collaboration with HashKey Group in Hong Kong
feed.summary: MoneyHero Limited has partnered with HashKey Group to enhance its digital asset wealth offerings in Hong Kong, providing consumers with broader access to regulated financial products from SFC-licensed platforms. This collaboration aligns with Hong Kong's ambition to become a leading digital asset market and strengthens MoneyHero's strategy to build a comprehensive personal finance ecosystem. The move aims to empower users with informed financial choices in the evolving digital asset landscape.

feed.title: MoneyHero (Nasdaq: MNY) Sets December 5 Results Release, 8 a.m. EDT Call
feed.summary: MoneyHero Group (Nasdaq: MNY) announced it will release its third-quarter 2025 results on December 5, 2025, before market open. A conference call to discuss the results will be held on the same day at 8:00 a.m. EDT. Investors can access the call via live webcast or audio conference, with a replay available for 12 months on the company's Investor Relations website.

feed.title: MoneyHero (NASDAQ: MNY) and Coinbase Report 61% of Singapore Investors Now Hold Crypto
feed.summary: MoneyHero and Coinbase released their "Pulse of Crypto — Singapore 2025" report, revealing that 61% of Singaporean investors hold cryptocurrency. The study, which surveyed 3,513 respondents, found that the average portfolio allocation to crypto is 6-12%, with a strong preference for long-term holding. Key factors for exchange selection are trust and fees, while social media is a primary source of crypto information, highlighting the need for better education and transparent, compliant platforms.

feed.title: MoneyHero and Coinbase Jointly Publish Pulse of Crypto — Singapore 2025 Survey Report
feed.summary: MoneyHero Limited and Coinbase Global, Inc. have jointly released the "Pulse of Crypto — Singapore 2025" survey report, revealing that 61% of finance-forward Singaporeans hold cryptocurrency, with trust being the primary factor in exchange selection. The report also highlights a preference for long-term holding over active trading among 58% of crypto-curious Singaporeans. It emphasizes the market's maturation in Singapore and identifies opportunities for growth through enhanced education, trust-building, and broader market participation.

feed.title: MoneyHero and Coinbase Release 2025 Singapore Crypto Survey Highlighting Trust and Ownership Trends
feed.summary: MoneyHero Limited and Coinbase Global's 2025 Singapore Crypto Survey reveals that 61% of finance-savvy Singaporeans own cryptocurrency, indicating a mature market where trust is paramount for exchange selection. The report emphasizes the need for improved education and transparency to mitigate misinformation risks and foster informed participation. It highlights growth opportunities in Singapore's crypto landscape by focusing on education, trust-building measures, and compliance with regulations.

feed.title: MoneyHero Second Quarter 2025 Earnings: EPS: US$0.01 (vs US$0.30 loss in 2Q 2024)
feed.summary: MoneyHero reported its second-quarter 2025 earnings, showing a significant improvement with an EPS of US$0.01, compared to a US$0.30 loss in the same quarter of the previous year. The company achieved a net income of US$216.0k, a turnaround from a US$12.2m loss in Q2 2024, despite a 13% decline in revenue to US$18.0m. Analysts forecast a 13% annual revenue growth for MoneyHero over the next three years, outpacing the Interactive Media and Services industry average of 11% in the US.

feed.title: MoneyHero Group Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
feed.summary: MoneyHero Group announced its Q2 2025 financial results, achieving profitability with a net income of US$0.2 million, a significant improvement from the previous year's net loss. The company's Adjusted EBITDA loss dramatically improved by 79% year-over-year, supported by a stronger revenue mix focusing on higher-margin insurance and wealth verticals, which now comprise 27% of revenue. Strategic investments in AI and partnerships are driving efficiency and growth, with continued emphasis on expanding these high-margin segments and achieving positive Adjusted EBITDA in late 2025.

feed.title: MoneyHero Group Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
feed.summary: MoneyHero Group announced its Q2 2025 financial results, achieving net income of US$0.2 million compared to a net loss of US$(12.2) million in the prior year, alongside a 79% improvement in Adjusted EBITDA loss to US$(2.0) million. The company's strategic focus on higher-margin Insurance and Wealth verticals, coupled with AI-driven efficiency and disciplined cost management, is driving it towards sustainable profitability, with an expectation of positive Adjusted EBITDA in late 2025. Revenue decreased by 13% to US$18.0 million due to a deliberate shift away from lower-margin credit card volumes, while group membership grew by 33% year-over-year to 8.6 million.

feed.title: MoneyHero Group Reports First Quarter 2025 Results
feed.summary: MoneyHero Group announced its Q1 2025 financial results, showing significant improvement with a 49% reduction in Adjusted EBITDA loss year-over-year to US$(3.3) million. The company's strategic pivot towards high-margin insurance and wealth verticals, which now account for 25% of revenue, and operational efficiency initiatives, including AI integration, led to a narrower net loss of US$(2.4) million. MoneyHero plans to further accelerate growth in the second half of 2025 through new banking partnerships and the launch of Credit Hero Club.

feed.title: MoneyHero Group Reports First Quarter 2025 Results
feed.summary: MoneyHero Limited reported significant financial improvements for Q1 2025, reducing its net loss to US$(2.4) million and improving Adjusted EBITDA loss by 49% year-over-year. The company's strategic pivot towards higher-margin verticals like insurance and wealth is proving effective, now accounting for 25% of revenue, and operational efficiencies are enhancing profitability. MoneyHero anticipates accelerating top-line growth and achieving positive Adjusted EBITDA in the latter half of 2025 through new partnerships and product launches like Credit Hero Club.

feed.title: MoneyHero Group Reports Second Quarter 2024 Results #MoneyHeroGroup
feed.summary: MoneyHero Group reported a 24% year-over-year revenue increase to US$20.7 million in Q2 2024, driven by strong performance in Singapore. The company facilitated 970,000 banking and insurance applications in H1 2024 and anticipates achieving Adjusted EBITDA profitability on a monthly basis within Q4 2024 due to strategic operational efficiencies and optimized marketing. Despite increased operating costs and temporary provider constraints in some markets, MoneyHero Group aims to deliver sustainable, long-term value by focusing on higher-margin products and strategic investments.

feed.title: MoneyHero Appoints New Group Heads of Marketing and Operations
feed.summary: MoneyHero Limited (NASDAQ: MNY) has announced the appointment of Liru Chan as Group Head of Marketing and Francois Picard as Group Head of Operations, effective May 6, 2024. These strategic hires, with their extensive experience from companies like Google, PayPal, Visa, and ShopBack, aim to strengthen MoneyHero's leadership as it pursues aggressive growth plans in Greater Southeast Asia. The new executives will focus on leading consumer marketing, brand development, and optimizing enterprise-wide operations to enhance shareholder value.
